start.core-application: export SYMFONY_ENV=prod && php app/console resque:worker worker-activate-verify,task-cancel,job-prepare,job-mark-completed,task-assign --log verbose --forkCount 5 --daemon > app/logs/resque.log
start.worker: export SYMFONY_ENV=prod && php app/console resque:worker task-cancel,task-report-completion,task-perform --log verbose --forkCount 3 --daemon > app/logs/resque.log
